answeredQuestions.core-problem: Stale SDK version exposes TeamBot to known bugs, rate limiting, and ecosystem drift
answeredQuestions.solution-approach: Dependency version bump with compatibility verification
answeredQuestions.product-type: Dependency upgrade + minor feature enhancement (/help SDK version display)
answeredQuestions.testing-approach: Hybrid - run existing 1084+ test suite; add targeted tests for /help version display
answeredQuestions.key-constraints: Minimal code changes; no new feature adoption; backward compatibility required
answeredQuestions.existing-patterns: SDK integration in sdk_client.py; defensive getattr for events; dict-based config

referencesProcessed.keyFindings: SDK pinned at 0.1.16 on line 11; Python >=3.10; uv package manager
Primary SDK integration; uses CopilotClient, SessionEventType; defensive getattr patterns
handle_help() returns CommandResult with multi-line string; no version info currently
Business problem defined; integration surface mapped; upstream changes assessed
